phrases: Episode 8: Memories Draw Spirals of the Past...
The smell of the roka fruit will be weaker after the rain, so that is good.
Are you done organizing the documents from Laxdo?
I do not have much on the progress during convalescence, though.
It is too far to visit.
I do not like this situation.
You were only allowed to be away for two days!
Sorry, it would been a while since I would been out of the castle, so I could not help it.
Anyway, what do not you like?
People believe she is Zen's fiancee, and everyone is attention is on her.
Some wonder if they will gain anything from being in her good graces,
and countless others are investigating to see if another house has fallen from favor.
I told Shirayuki to be careful, too, but...
Obi, I will have you act as Shirayuki's bodyguard.
I have a record of threatening her, you know.
When I gave you permission to leave the grounds by yourself,
I did think of the possibility that you would not come back.
I will start from the west side.
It is the first time I have seen you two together.
Oh no, Miss Kiki and I have had fun on watch together, too, you know.
I have no recollection of that.
Shirayuki, you knew that this man was one of Zen's attendants?
The master forgot his own shortcomings and got mad.
Zen said he wanted to leave this man with you for a while.
The chief herbalist also said it was okay if that was what the prince wanted.
In fact, she said she would aggressively, vigorously,
and thoroughly make the most use of him she could.
You can decide to send him away whenever you want, Shirayuki.
Please keep him with you for now.
So, why are you wearing a mask?
We are harvesting roka fruit, but the smell they give off makes people drunk.
The prince and chief herbalist both gave their permission, right?
Let us finish this quickly, Miss.
Only pick the ones that have a four-pointed star pattern at the tip of the fruit.
Stay away from the shriveled ones.
Are you getting drunk on the smell?
As long as this is what you mean by a four-pointed star.
My hand's moving on its own?
If you are going to move your hands, then take these, too.
We will put these in underground storage now, right?
Yeah, the jars placed there six months ago should be ready,
so we will see how those are doing and bring them back to the medicine room.
This work could try your patience, huh?
If you keep doing it, it is interesting.
As an apprentice court herbalist, and a friend of the prince,
you seem to be having a lot of fun with what you have right now.
It looks like he is doing his job properly, huh?
Do you ever wish Prince Zen was not a prince?
The next time you say that, I will take it as an insult.
It is roka that has been soaked for six months.
You should try drinking it so you know what it tastes like, Shirayuki.
Chief Herbalist, that is not roka, it is alcohol, is not it?
Shirayuki, you cannot hold your liquor?
Do you ever wish Prince Zen was not a prince?
This is Mitsuhide Louen, of the Sereg Knights from the east.
I will have him by your side starting from today.
I do not need you to.
I was told to remain by your side for the present by Prince Izana.
You actually wanted to serve my brother, did not you?
It was obvious from the moment you were introduced.
The way you looked at him was different.
No, what am I doing letting him see through me?
I thought you were not able to get away.
Do not underestimate my ability to escape.
But I heard you got a new attendant.
Do not talk about stuff like that.
It does not have anything to do with him.
I do not know what to do with someone ordered to be by my side.
Must be hard being a prince.
Do not say that like it has nothing to do with you.
A humble archer guard like me does not understand hard things like that.
I have a pretty face, so it is fine.
And I am a good archer.
You cannot see the pretty boy in front of you?
It will be bad if people find out the prince is playing with someone like me.
I am glad I found you...
Prince Zen, was the one who just climbed the tree your friend?
You are nothing more than an attendant.
As long as you are with me, that is all you will ever be.
I would ask that you not say cold words like that.
But I only said what was obvious.
That back that was still young...
I did not know anything about the burden he bore during this time...
The soldiers are talking about him, too.
He is young, and he came suddenly.
That guy's a little different from a soldier or retainer.
Everything about him is strange, so it is hard to figure out how to react.
I have heard he is a skilled swordsman, too.
You cannot beat him, can you?
Your face shows everything, Prince Zen.
It is easy to tell what you are thinking.
You are the only one who would say that.
I just snuck into the mess hall and made something.
You are good with your hands.
To tell the truth, the time I spend with you is the most fun and relaxing.
I have no intention of becoming a prince's consort, you know.
And I have no intention of marrying a man.
I am going to be on the night shift from now on.
I will not be able to walk around during the day like I have been anymore.
Do you think you can get away sometimes at night, too?
I told you, did not I?
Do not underestimate my ability to escape.
He came to the castle four months ago.
He is about the same age as Prince Zen.
They are probably meeting in secret thinking of each other's social status.
he is a normal boy who came to work here from a far away land.
I will look into him a little more...
What are you in a daze about?
That is why you are like this now.
I wonder if it is cold at night already?
Hey, in order to protect myself and my authority as a prince,
how much distance do you think I need to put between me and those around me?
Even from your perspective, my brother's good at that, right?
If I could just copy him, I would not have to learn it myself.
I think I just wanted to ask myself that.
You do not have to answer.
It is true that it would not be hard to get hired for a position like that.
Even if he cannot come to the inner areas of the castle,
with Prince Zen going out, there is plenty of opportunity for contact between them.
Now that I have looked into it more, I believe we should be wary of him.
I am glad I had you stay by his side.
The position of Zen's personal attendant has been vacant for a while.
Right now, he is rebelling against being a prince.
He switched to the night shift?
That appears to be the case...
How did you get those injuries?
Please do not run away or anything, your highness.
Is that why you cut me?
It will be a problem if you let your feelings get the best of you after we have gotten this far.
Do not look down on me.
I did not come here with that kind of half-assed resolve.
We have business with Prince Izana.
You are going to bring him out to us.
You want us to return Prince Zen safely, do not you?
That is a roundabout way to do things.
He already suspected, I am sure...
Let us hear your name and business.
Before that, why do not you throw away your sword, Prince Izana.
I said, tell me your name.
We are what is left of the Lido family you punished.
Prince Izana, do you know how many people who served the Lido family
lost their means to earn a living because of you?
I do not know how many, but I know what kind of people they are.
They were idiots who called themselves victims, pawns of their lord,
but lined their own pockets by trampling on the good.
Those who think of the citizens of the land before their own profit
are working hard even now in the land of Lido for Clarines' sake.
Compared to them, where were you useless rebels hiding?
Atri, we do not need him anymore.
You were a Lido rebel, too?
I do not have anything to do other than to rid myself of my resentment.
I understood after I met you...
A warm room, delicious food, friends who cherished you...
You had all that just because you were born as royalty in this country...
I thought that was ridiculous from the bottom of my heart, Prince Zen!
No matter what you think of me...
I am still looking for answers...
That face... is too easy to read...
Do not be... so sad... so seriously...
It might have been better... if you had not been a prince...
His back, eyes, and heart were still young...
Back then, I did not know anything about the burden he bore...
And back then, Zen just stifled his cries...
Zen's always been a prince, and there are people who act because of that, right?
Master, your eyes are a beautiful color...
I ended up somewhere annoying, huh?
Episode 9: Feelings that Connect and Reach
